title: Party Leaders to meet on Friday (27) on 21A
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A special discussion will be held on Friday (27) regarding the 21st Amendment to the Constitution with the participation of all party leaders represented in Parliament under the leadership of the Prime Minister.

President’s Counsel Wijeyadasa Rajapaksa, who is Sri Lanka’s Minister of Justice stated that the views and suggestions of the party leaders regarding the 21st Amendment Bill will be sought at this meeting.
The Minister of Justice stated that the ideas and proposals obtained will be submitted to the Cabinet next week.
